name: Paper Trains
description:
Paper Trains is a game that travels from player to player.

Download it onto a USB stick. Play it, and choose a question. This question will become your train. You can answer it if you want, to build a carriage out of your answer.

Give the USB stick to someone else. They should answer, to add their own carriage, and then pass it on again.

Over time, a long train will be built, by a number of people who may never know each other, but can add just a little something each time.

A game by Hannah Rose

Music by Plum
